blocks.heading: Equip your team with **essential AI skills**
blocks.description:
Everyone’s testing prompts. Few are getting real gains.\
This hands-on workshop gives your team the skills and systems to turn AI into actual productivity, not just hallway hype.

blocks.heading: Why Results Lag Behind the Hype?
blocks.body:
Almost half of employees already dabble with AI. Studies show the right prompt can cut some tasks to a third of the time.

So why isn’t the whole company moving faster?

cards.heading: Workers use AI in secret
cards.description: Employees fear being punished, laid off, or labeled “cheaters,” so they hide ChatGPT tabs. Tips and gains stay invisible, and the company can’t spread the wins

cards.heading: No prompt libraries
cards.description: A clever prompt in someone’s notebook isn’t a process. Without a shared template or script, wins stay one-off and disappear when that employee is on leave.

cards.heading: No “lab” team to test and share wins
cards.description: Nobody owns quick experiments, prototypes, and internal how-to docs, so every department reinvents the wheel or gives up.

cards.heading: Only using AI for the “easy stuff”
cards.description: If AI only cleans up typos or meeting notes, you’re wasting horsepower. The real gains come when AI tackles chunky tasks like data analysis or preparing market research in minutes.

cards.heading: Leaders talk big, but stay fuzzy
cards.description: They announce “AI is our future,” yet never explain what jobs will change or how success will be rewarded. Without a clear picture, staff keep doing the old routine.

blocks.heading: A Workshop Built for **Real AI Adoption**
blocks.body: This isn’t theory. It’s hands-on. We train your team to actually use AI in daily work, and build systems that stick. One intense day; five tightly scoped modules.

accordionItems.label: Your AI Starting Point
accordionItems.content: Understand the core concepts behind large language models and explore the popular AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Grok

accordionItems.label: Getting Smarter AI Responses
accordionItems.content: Learn how to ask questions for the best answers, understand AI's "memory" and "knowledge," and choose the right model for superior results

accordionItems.label: AI That Thinks & Finds Info
accordionItems.content: Leverage AI's advanced "thinking" abilities for complex problems like coding, and use its built-in internet search for the latest information

accordionItems.label: AI for Deep Work & Creativity
accordionItems.content: Conduct detailed research for custom reports, analyze documents, visualize data, and use AI as a powerful assistant for programming and custom app development

accordionItems.label: Talk, See, & Personalize Your AI
accordionItems.content: Interact naturally with AI using your voice, images, and video, then customize it to remember your preferences and perform specialized tasks. Get practical tips for choosing the right AI tools, optimizing your usage, and staying ahead in the rapidly evolving AI landscape

accordionItems.label: ✨ Post-Wokshop Support
accordionItems.content: Post-workshop check-ins and template library to help your team turn experiments into roll-outs

blocks.heading: At a Glance
blocks.description: A one-day, on-site workshop to get your team up to speed with practical, business-ready AI skills

features.heading: $5,200 + GST
features.description: Flat rate for up to 20 participants

features.heading: Post-Workshop Toolkit
features.description: Includes slides, cheat sheets, and workflows

cards.heading: 1️⃣ Quick call to map goals
cards.description: We map your team’s goals, use cases, and current AI maturity. Everything we need to tailor the workshop.

cards.heading: 2️⃣ On-Site Workshop Day
cards.description: One focused day at your office. Live demos, hands-on labs, real workflows. Your team leaves ready to apply what they learned.

cards.heading: 3️⃣ Post-Workshop Support
cards.description: Follow-up meetings and templates to keep momentum, answer questions, and turn experiments into production.

accordionItems.label: How much does it cost?
accordionItems.content: The full-day, on-site workshop is priced at $5,200 + GST. This covers up to 20 participants and includes all materials, hands-on labs, and post-workshop resources.

accordionItems.label: Do I need to know how to code?
accordionItems.content: Absolutely not, we focus on practical workflows that anyone from marketing to ops can use. If you write emails, crunch numbers, or manage projects, you’ll walk out with new AI superpowers.

accordionItems.label: How long is the workshop?
accordionItems.content: One intense day; four tightly scoped modules. Energy drinks optional but recommended.

accordionItems.label: How many seats are available?
accordionItems.content: We cap each workshop at \~20 people. That’s the sweet spot where everyone gets hands-on time with the instructor, and no one’s stuck waiting to try the demos.

accordionItems.label: What will my team take away?
accordionItems.content: Repeatable AI playbooks, a toolkit of prompt patterns, and the confidence to automate the boring stuff on Monday.

blocks.heading: Ulysses Maclaren
blocks.description: Uly brings 20+ years of enterprise consulting experience, helping companies adopt emerging technology with confidence. He’s led AI enablement sessions for businesses looking to cut through the hype and build systems that drive measurable outcomes.

blocks.heading: Built on Real-World AI Delivery
blocks.body: SSW isn’t guessing. We’ve been building and fixing AI systems for years, across industries, tech stacks, and use cases. This workshop distills the lessons that save teams time, money, and frustration.

cards.description: SSW’s Gert Marx joins Chris Simon at NDC Melbourne to break down the latest on Contextive, the open-source tool helping devs write code that better aligns with business needs.
At NDC, Ulysses Maclaren talks with Richard Campbell about AI’s growing energy demands, Microsoft’s nuclear plans, and the massive infrastructure shifts behind our data-hungry future.
Ulysses shares best practices for responsible AI: transparency, critical thinking, privacy, and using AI to actually boost productivity and stay ahead in your career.

blocks.heading: Equip your team with **essential AI skills**
